query: We are a group of 2 people looking for a week-long travel itinerary starting from Myrtle Beach and covering 3 cities in Pennsylvania from March 2nd to March 8th, 2022 with a budget of $8,200. We plan to stay in private rooms. During our travel, we'd love to sample American, French, Indian, and Mediterranean cuisines. Also, we should be able to host parties at our accommodations.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Philadelphia,State College,Harrisburg]
